chapter.title: First steps in OTRS::ITSM
chapter.para: The first thing that you might notice is that OTRS::ITSM completely uses the agent and customer interfaces (customer frontend) implemented in OTRS. If OTRS has been used before, all features and steps such as login, queue configuration, user preferences, filters, rules, user permissions, etc. can continue to be used without any modifications.
